summary: THE BRAKES MADE A LOUD NOISE WHEN THEY WERE DEPRESSED.  IT WAS LATER DETERMINED THAT THE ROTORS WERE PITTED.  THE INDEPENDENT REPAIR SHOP INDICATED THIS MAY BE CAUSED  BY A POSSIBLE DEFECT IN THE ROTORS MATERIAL.   *NLM  THERE WAS 50 PERCENT OF THE BRAKE PAD LIFE THAT REMAINED.  FORD STATED THAT THERE IS NO RECALL FOR THIS PROBLEM AND WILL NOT REPAIR THE ROTORS.  (THE VEHICLE WAS PAST WARRANTY)  *SCC
